  -- RAM content
  signal mem : dp_ar_ram_type := (
--BEGIN_WORDS_ENTRY
128 => "00000000000000000000000000000000",
129 => "00000000000000000000000010000000",
130 => "00000000000000000000000001111111",
0 => "00000000000000000000000100000000",
1 => "00100000000000010000000000100000",
2 => "00000000101000010000001000000000",
3 => "00000001000000000010000000001010",
4 => "11111001111111111010011101010111",
5 => "00000000000000000000000010100111",
others => (others => '0')
--END_WORDS_ENTRY
    );
